items.sentence: My biggest regret is that I didn't tell Tom to leave sooner.
Tom folded the newspaper and put it back into his briefcase.
Over the summer months, Tom began seriously studying French.
It's true that we can't be too careful choosing our friends.
I think I'll be able to figure out how to do that on my own.
I'm looking for the remote control. Do you know where it is?
All three of the boys jumped into the pool at the same time.
My parents told me to not ever get in a car with a stranger.
My son surprised me by cleaning his room without being told.
Don't you have anything better to do than read this garbage?
